title: Getting Home: Update
dc:creator: WBUR
description: We listen back to the story of Shane Correia and get an update from him. Shane's life has been mostly chaos -- from domestic violence, to a murder conviction in his family, to homelessness. But he's had two constants: a folder and a turtle.
itunes:author: WBUR
